Title: Sidvall WorkItem Manager
Description:
A tool for organizing tasks. The tools consists of 3 parts:
- workers
- a Management Tool
- a database
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A tool for managing tasks. The tools consists of 3 parts:

  1. Workers (Console Applications) that run as windows scheduled tasks on one or more servers. The workers processes tasks that has been assigned to them.
  2. A management tool that lets the user monitor the workers.
  3. A database that stores workers configuration and the work item results.

The Management Tool

Dependencies

The project uses the following libraries:

  • Sidvall Application Framework
  • MvvmCross
